owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear G864KLfahada,

Greetings from The Manor by JA!

Thank you for sharing your positive feedback. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be friendly and helpful. We take pride in providing exceptional experiences for our guests, and your kind words are a testament to our commitment. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another fantastic stay.

Kind regards,
Khalid Mehmood
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: The Manor Hotel By JA

data.text:
I love the hotel !
First and very important I slept like a baby !
Clean, friendly people. 
They have an small gym, pool on the terrace, spa, beauty salon, small store where you can buy some souvenirs.
The breakfast was good and you have options.
And is just like 15-18 min to JBR. 
Definitely I recommend the hotel !
data.title: Happy during my stay

data.text: I had a great time. Mamun was excellent. I lived on the 6th floor and he always cleaned my room well. He went the extra mile. He definitely made my stay here unforgettable. He cleaned twice a week. Whenever I wanted water he got me some. He showed me around.
data.title: Khalil Jah: my experience

data.text: Excellent experience that I had with the Manor hotel, I would like to especially highlight the rooms, they are very simple but so cozy and you have everything you need to make a comfortable stay. Pillows and mattresses are very comfortable clean and bed sheets are so comfortable and clean when you sleep you feel so comfortable. Interior of the room and colors they have used very attractive and clean. The housekeeping team is doing an excellent job as the room is very clean and everything inside arranged very neatly. Bathroom with clean towels and clean vanity and modern fixtures which are very attractive. I feel the cleanliness is excellent when I am stepping on the floor. They provide all the amenities what you need, and it was very fast service from housekeeping team whenever I requested something. I have seen they keep clean the carpets everyday morning and I would really appreciate the housekeeping team for keeping the area clean. My room was clean very well by Boran and he was so attentive for my requests and my needs when I am staying there. Overall thank you for the clean bed linen, clean bathroom, clean room as it totally worth paying the rates and staying there. I would like to recommend this hotel to everyone and excellent housekeeping service they provide.
data.title: Excellent stay, excellent housekeeping
